iti31:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco katakalyāṇo hoti, katakusalo, katabhīruttāṇo, akatapāpo, akataluddo, akatakibbiso.
iti31:4.4: So ‘kataṃ me kalyāṇan’tipi na tappati, ‘akataṃ me pāpan’tipi na tappati.
iti31:4.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve dhammā atapanīyā”ti.
iti31:7.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
